Title: Clash by Night
Writer: Richard Morgan (based on the novel by), Laeta Kalogridis (created by), Brian Nelson, Nevin Densham (executive story editor), Richard Morgan (consultant writer)
Actors: Joel Kinnaman, James Purefoy, Martha Higareda, Chris Conner
Plot: His world rocked, Kovacs requests a dipper to help him sew up the Bancroft case quickly. Ortega races to identify the mystery woman from Fight Drome.
